title: Park Hyatt Luxury in Washington DC
description: Experience the ultimate in all-American luxury in the capital of the USA. Spend three nights at Park Hyatt Washington DC - rated by Cond√© Nast Traveler, as one of the best hotels in the city, with daily breakfasts at the Michelin-starred Blue Duck Tavern and welcome amenities on arrival for two.

title: Washington DC Stay Near Iconic Landmarks with Onsite Bistro
description: Immerse yourself in America's esteemed history with a stay at Kimpton George Hotel, an IHG Hotel, located in the renowned Capitol Hill district. Learn more about the political heritage of Washington DC in the heart of downtown with access to iconic landmarks like the Capitol Building, Washington Monument and the Lincoln Memorial. After a day of exploration, fuel up at the onsite Bistro Bis or stretch your muscles in the fitness centre before turning into your heritage-themed room.
location_description: Kimpton George Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 15 E Street Northwest, Washington DC 20001, United States

title: Stylish Washington DC Stay with Pool near Fashionable Georgetown District
description:
Stay in the heart of the US capital where sophistication meets contemporary style at Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle. A downtown sanctuary, positioned just a stone's throw from fashionable Georgetown, this is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city, with the very best of DC on your doorstep - including winding shopping streets, private art galleries, national museums, theatres and upmarket eateries.

Explore the US capital on foot, or hire a bike from reception to see the best of the city on two wheels. After busy days of exploring, retreat to the hotel where you can laze by the glistening outdoor pool, dine at Certo restaurant or work up a sweat in the 24-hour fitness centre.

title: Glamorous Washington DC Stay Near Iconic Landmarks With Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating fusion of history and contemporary elegance at Kimpton Hotel Monaco Washington DC, an IHG Hotel, nestled in the vibrant Penn Quarter. Explore iconic landmarks of the nation's capital, indulge in a vibrant shopping, dining, and nightlife scene, and enjoy seamless access to public transport. After a busy day exploring, delight in a selection of share plates and expertly crafted cocktails at the onsite Dirty Habit restaurant and bar.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Washington DC, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 700 F Street NW, Washington DC 20004, United States

title: Art-Deco Sofitel Washington DC Stay near The White House with French Bistro
description:
Take your place among dignitaries and diplomats with a stay at this prestigious hotel, situated in the heart of Washington DC's vibrant downtown district. This opulent retreat is a stone's throw from the White House, the National Mall and the Smithsonian Museums, placing you at the epicentre of American history and culture.

Savour French-American cuisine at the onsite Opaline Bar & Brasserie, or venture out to explore the city's diverse culinary scene. The hotel's state-of-the-art fitness centre and tranquil spa offer the perfect respite after a day of sightseeing.
